titles.title: To require the establishment of a Department of Veterans Affairs outpatient clinic at the Olympic Medical Center, Port Angeles, Washington.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 12/5/2006--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to enter into an agreement with Clallam County, Washington, for the establishment of a veterans' outpatient clinic at the Olympic Medical Center, Port Angeles, Washington.
